newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Three die, 17 injured by bombs in Philippines.
newsitem.headline: Three die, 17 injured by bombs in Philippines.

text.p: Three people died and 17 were injured when two home-made bombs exploded on Sunday at a bus terminal and in a passenger bus in the southern Philippine city of Cagayan de Oro, police said.

The first bomb, planted near a cafe inside the terminal, killed two people while the second device, hidden in a thermos bottle, killed a passenger in a bus that had just left the terminal, investigators said. The explosions occurred within 15 minutes of each other.
Motive was not immediately known and no suspects have been arrested, police officer Rolando Gonzaga said by telephone from Cagayan de Oro on Mindanao island, 800 km (500 miles) south of Manila.
